description: Remote unauthorized command execution and unauthorized disclosure of information in Micro Focus Service Manager, versions 9.30, 9.31, 9.32, 9.33, 9.34, 9.35, 9.40, 9.41, 9.50, 9.51, 9.52, 9.60, 9.61. This vulnerability could allow Remote unauthorized command execution and unauthorized disclosure of information.
